title: A Quick Tour of Weaviate
description: Become familiar with Weaviate's architecture, core concepts, and key capabilities. Understand how its features and integrations map to AI builders' needs.

title: Your First AI App (Search and RAG)
description: A hands-on course where you will build a movie recommendation API with Weaviate and FastAPI.

title: A Gentle Deep Dive into AI Models
description: A detailed overview of AI models from the perspective of application builders and developers. Learn how to distinguish between models and why model selection matters.
